Params: {3: 'The rain hammers down in unrelenting sheets.'}
{3: 'Her frame runs at full intensity, blazing with pure white lightâ€”and wherever it shines, the Red Tide falters.'}
{3: 'Every goodbye rings like a death knell drawing ever closer.'}
{3: 'The "reversal" device gleams like a star, and with one final, piercing wail, the colossal monster collapses lifeless beneath the torrential rain.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You acted all impatient, saying "The Purifying Force is just a tool in Babylonia\'s grip," but you still gave me all the time I needed to investigate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You acted like you didn't care, but you were always the one taking the most dangerous missions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "So you still chose the same this time... didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca drops to one knee beside the enormous monster, her gaze fixed on those still-open eyes.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Even at the end... you were still trying to protect us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Yes, she kept absorbing the Punishing Virus in the Red Tide, devouring the Hetero-Creatures spawned in the sea...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Until the very end of her life.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca lets out a soft sigh and stands up, cranking the "reversal" device to its maximum.'}
{3: "Under its power, the monster's massive body slowly dissolves into countless Punishing particles, disappearing into thin air."}
{3: "She couldn't choose where her life began, but she could decide how it would end."}
{3: "As the Punishing Virus slowly fades away, a crystalline shard gently breaks off from what's left of Chiko's body."}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "...Don't trust a word Vonnegut says. Kill Chiko, take the Heteromer Shard.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The young girl\'s face slowly morphs into that of the deceased "monster," becoming indistinguishable.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "...You don't need to know who I am. It's not important.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When she left... what was going through her head?'}
{3: 'The torrential downpour smashes against the ocean waves, washing over the altar.'}
{3: 'Bianca is stumped, but before she can react, her CUB devours the crystalline shard that pulsates with the Punishing Virus.'}
{2: "Let's head back to the aquarium and regroup with the others.", 3: '105'}
{3: 'The female Construct turns her head, her white headscarf showing signs of burns.'}
{3: "She's still Bianca, yet not quite the Bianca she once was."}
{3: 'She has broken free from all the labels imposed upon her by the outside world, forging them into a symbol that belongs uniquely to herself.'}
